title: LOL Client doesn't work
body:
So yesterday I updated my lol and played 2 games with my friend, then when I'm getting on 3rd game, lol client went white screen, it just won't load into the game. I'm sure that there's internet connection. This happened for every game I start ever since then.
I tried reinstalling it and all it changed is white to black, so now I've got a black screen, can't go out with alt+tab. What's actually going on? Can anyone tell me how to fix it?
btw im using the mac book pro touch bar (macOS Sierra ver10.12.3)
is it a mac thing?

replies.body:
Most of the time, if a program critically fails and crashes it will default to some kind of blank, almost transparent white screen. It sounds like this might be the case, especially since you aren't even able to alt+tab out of it. 

There's a chance that some of your game files were damaged somehow, so let's grab out [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a reinstall and clean uninstall as well. Hit me back if that doesn't seem to help and we can dig a little deeper into this!
